aws_vpc.summary: Creates a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) to isolate resources in a private network boundary.

aws_subnet.summary: Creates a subnet inside a VPC. Used for public/private segmentation and AZ placement.

aws_security_group.summary: Defines stateful firewall rules for inbound/outbound traffic.

aws_lb.summary: Creates an Application/Network Load Balancer to distribute traffic across targets.

aws_ecs_service.summary: Runs and maintains a desired count of containers on ECS (often behind an ALB).

aws_rds_instance.summary: Provisions a managed relational database instance.
